lead_paragraph: The no-frills passenger airline is looking to raise $500 million in its initial public offering, implying a valuation of about $2 billion.
snippet: The no-frills passenger airline is looking to raise $500 million in its initial public offering, implying a valuation of about $2 billion....

headline.main: Frontier Airlines Is Said to Hire Banks to Plan Stock Debut
headline.print_headline: Frontier, a No-Frills Airline, Is Said to Hire Banks to Plan Its Public Market Debut
